ac: 18, touch 17, flat-footed 16 (+1 Dex, +1 dodge, +2 monk, +1 natural, +3 Wis)
special_attacks: flurry of blows, stunning fist (8/day, DC 17)
melee: unarmed strike +10/+5 (1d10+4) or mwk greataxe +11/+6 (1d12+6/×3) or unarmed strike flurry of blows +10/+10/+5/+5 (1d10+4)
other_gear: masterwork greataxe, shuriken (20), amulet of natural armor +1, cloak of resistance +1, headband of inspired wisdom +2, 119 gp
feats: Defensive Combat Training, Dodge, Greater Grapple, Imp. Grapple, Imp. Initiative, Imp.  Unarmed Strike, Power Attack, Scorpion Style, Stunning Fist

sections.body: During Combat The monk uses Stunning Fist, Scorpion Style, and Greater Grapple.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Augmenting a monk's grace with the power of a greataxe, these half-orcs hack and crush their way to victory.

special_qualities: fast movement, high jump, ki pool (7 points, magic), maneuver training, orc blood, purity of body, slow fall 40 ft., weapon familiarity, wholeness of body
name: Axe Dancer
skills: Acrobatics +9 (+25 when jumping), Intimidate +12, Perception +13, Sense Motive +14, Stealth +11
